lines.text: I see what you mean. It's improbable, isn't it?
No, I'm sorry. No, I didn't mean to...
No, no. It's quite alright. Hardly anyone believes me at first but when I multiply a few 10 digit numbers and give them the cube root for a few more, they come around.
Look this may be my last night in Tremaggio. Will you have dinner with me?
30. We'll do some compound fractions before dinner.

Little else remains to be told. While other little girls were rolling hoops or playing games with little boys, I was at home, contentedly finding the hypotenuse of this or that, letting x equal all sort of things. Before you could find the cube root of 9, I was a well-known genius.
You're quite a mathematician, aren't you?
